sentences.english: A big part of "eSports" is the concept of balanced play, level playing field.
sentences.chinese: 电子竞技的一个重要内容是平衡及等级分野。

sentences.english: NVIDIA World Cup for E-sports contest , the grand FITA round will be adopted.
sentences.chinese: NVIDIA世界杯电子竞技大赛，选拔赛是淘汰制。

sentences.english: The team have recently competed in the World E-Sports Games league in South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 该队最近参加了于韩国举行的世界电子竞技联赛。
